Package de.susebox.jtopas

Interface Summary
KeywordHandler Deprecated. Replaced by KeywordHandler (de.susebox.jtopas.spi.KeywordHandler)
Plugin Deprecated. replaced by the de.susebox.jtopas.spi package
SeparatorHandler Deprecated. replaced by the new SeparatorHandler interface
SequenceHandler Deprecated. replaced by the new SequenceHandler interface
Tokenizer The interface Tokenizer contains setup methods, parse operations and other getter and setter methods for a tokenizer.
TokenizerProperties The interface TokenizerProperties declares constants and methods to maintain the characteristics of a Tokenizer, e. g. comments, keywords and special sequences.
TokenizerPropertyListener The interface TokenizerPropertyListener is implemented by classes that are interested in changes in TokenizerProperties objects.
TokenizerSource This interface describes the data source for a Tokenizer.
WhitespaceHandler Deprecated.  
 

Class Summary
InputStreamSource Deprecated. in favour of the new ReaderSource
JTopasTestSuite  
PluginTokenizer Deprecated. replaced by the implementations of Tokenizer and TokenizerProperties
ReaderSource This implementation of the TokenizerSource interface uses the JDK Reader class to realize the requested functionality.
StandardTokenizer This is the mainstream Tokenizer.
StandardTokenizerProperties The class StandardTokenizerProperties provides a simple implementation of the TokenizerProperties interface for use in most situations.
TestDifficultSituations  
TestEmbeddedTokenizer  
TestLargeSource  
TestMultithreadTokenizer  
TestMultithreadTokenizerProperties  
TestPatternMatching  
TestPluginTokenizer  
TestStandardTokenizer  
TestTextAccess  
TestTokenizerCleanup  
TestTokenizerProperties  
Token Instances of this class are created by the classes implementing the Tokenizer interface.
TokenizerProperty This class is mainly used by TokenizerProperties implementations to return Iterator objects of their various properties (keywords, special sequences etc.).
TokenizerPropertyEvent The class TokenizerPropertyEvent describes changes in TokenizerProperties objects.
 

Exception Summary
TokenizerException Wrapper exception for all the problems that may occur while parsing.
